devdoc.details: The Asset contract has an owner who can transfer the ownership of the asset an Asset contract is tracked via an AssetSeries contract

allowance(address).details: Function to check if a trustee is allowed to transfer on behalf the owner

params._trustee: address The address which will spend the funds.

allowance(address).return: A bool specifying if the trustee can still transfer the Asset

approve(address).details: Approve the passed address to transfer the Asset on behalf of msg.sender.

params._trustee: The address which will spend the funds.

claim().details: Allows the pendingOwner address to finalize the transfer.

constructor.details: The Asset constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

removeApproval(address).details: Approve the passed address to transfer the Asset on behalf of msg.sender.

params._trustee: The address which will spend the funds.

transfer(address).details: Allows the current owner to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferFrom(address).details: Allows an approved trustee to set the pendingOwner address.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.
